title: Myles Garrett SUSPENDED INDEFINITELY - Emergency Podcast (Football 11/15)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough to react to Myles Garrett being indefinitely suspended by the NFL. The guys further breakdown the incident at the end of Thursday night's Browns-Steelers game, discuss whether the punishment was fair, if Freddie Kitchens has control of Cleveland and whether Mason Rudolph should have faced ramifications for his role in everything.

Note: This podcast was recorded immediately after news of Garrett's suspension. There are now reporters Mason Rudolph could be suspended.
